description: Multi-object tracking involves identifying and following multiple objects over time in a video or a sequence of images. This problem is particularly challenging in complex environments where objects may occlude each other or change appearance.
you_have_this_if: You need to track several objects simultaneously.
Objects frequently overlap or occlude each other.
You are working in a dynamic environment.
You are implementing a solution for robotics or surveillance.

approaches.best_for: When tracking multiple objects in complex environments with occlusions.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Balances accuracy and complexity in a single-stage tracking solution.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need a robust solution for tracking multiple objects in environments with frequent occlusions.

start_here: Start with the MOT-DETR technique as it provides a balanced approach for tracking multiple objects in complex scenarios, especially when occlusions are present.
